attributes.action: Scrap the proposed logo for the 2012 London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that the proposed logo for the 2012 London Olympics is substandard. The fundamentally flawed design by Wolff Olins does not reflect the wealth of creativity for which the UK is internationally renowned. To allow the current branding to remain will seriously diminish the presentation the whole event at every level.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
